name: Papercup
description:
Papercup is a machine learning start-up transforming the media industry. 99.9% of video content is shackled to a single language. Our ambition is to make the world's content watchable in any language. We're translating videos by generating voices that sound like the original speaker, not only capturing the characteristics of your voice but also the way you speak.

We are backed by LocalGlobe (investors in Zoopla, Transferwise, Improbable), Entrepreneur First (investors in Tractable, Magic Pony, Bloomsbury AI) and two of the largest media companies in the UK.

team.name: Jesse Shemen
team.bioHtml: Founder @Papercup • Worked at @Deloitte Ventures, @Octopus Investments

team.name: Lorenzo Foglianti
team.bioHtml: Mphil Machine Learning at University of Cambridge

jobs.title: Frontend (React) Developer
jobs.description:
**About the role**

As a frontend developer, you will know our product intimately and will be building out key frontend features. You will contribute to the creation and development of new product ideas and work closely with our designer, product team as well as the machine learning team to define and develop functionalities that's never been attempted before. 

**About you:**

- have been an integral part of a product-oriented company
- understand how to balance writing good code and building a great product
- have worked in a start-up before and know how to get things done
- are ready to own something new

**In terms of technical skills, you have:**

- 2-5 years' commercial experience with React at its centre (or 3-5 years with at least 2 other frontend frameworks)
- a solid understanding of frontend technologies eg. JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3

**And it'd be great if you also have exposure or experience to:**

- frontend languages and API frameworks such as TypeScript and GraphQL, as well as styling frameworks such as Storybook
- design tools such as Zeppelin and Sketch
- Python as a backend language
- Expirience with AWS or GCP

About the role

As a frontend developer, you will know our product intimately and will be building out key frontend features. You will contribute to the creation and development of new product ideas and work closely with our designer, product team as well as the machine learning team to define and develop functionalities that's never been attempted before.

About you:

  • have been an integral part of a product-oriented company
  • understand how to balance writing good code and building a great product
  • have worked in a start-up before and know how to get things done
  • are ready to own something new

In terms of technical skills, you have:

  • 2-5 years' commercial experience with React at its centre (or 3-5 years with at least 2 other frontend frameworks)
  • a solid understanding of frontend technologies eg. JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3

And it'd be great if you also have exposure or experience to:

  • frontend languages and API frameworks such as TypeScript and GraphQL, as well as styling frameworks such as Storybook
  • design tools such as Zeppelin and Sketch
  • Python as a backend language
  • Expirience with AWS or GCP

jobs.title: Fullstack Developer
jobs.description:
**About the role**

As a fullstack developer, you will evolve into a pillar of the engineering team. You will know our product intimately and will always be thinking about new ways to improve it. You will be an expert full stack developer with great knowledge of back end development who can convert machine learning research code into production code. You will contribute to the creation of new product ideas and develop product features with our designer and machine learning team.

**About you**

- are a top developer amongst your peers and an integral part of a product-oriented company
- understand how to balance writing good code and building a great product
- have worked in a start-up before and know how to get things done
- be ready to own something new

**In terms of technical skills, you have at least two of:**

- 2+ years experience of React
- 2+ years experience of Python
- extensive knowledge of AWS, Azure or Google Cloud
- Solid understanding of datastorage systems (SQL/noSQL)

And it'd be great if you also have exposure or experience to frontend languages and API frameworks such as TypeScript and GraphQL, as well as styling frameworks such as Tachyons
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About the role

As a fullstack developer, you will evolve into a pillar of the engineering team. You will know our product intimately and will always be thinking about new ways to improve it. You will be an expert full stack developer with great knowledge of back end development who can convert machine learning research code into production code. You will contribute to the creation of new product ideas and develop product features with our designer and machine learning team.

About you

  • are a top developer amongst your peers and an integral part of a product-oriented company
  • understand how to balance writing good code and building a great product
  • have worked in a start-up before and know how to get things done
  • be ready to own something new

In terms of technical skills, you have at least two of:

  • 2+ years experience of React
  • 2+ years experience of Python
  • extensive knowledge of AWS, Azure or Google Cloud
  • Solid understanding of datastorage systems (SQL/noSQL)

And it'd be great if you also have exposure or experience to frontend languages and API frameworks such as TypeScript and GraphQL, as well as styling frameworks such as Tachyons

jobs.title: Growth Marketing Lead
jobs.description:
Are you someone who loves pivot tables as much as you love writing creative copy? Do you get a buzz from all things digital? Are you looking to direct your energy and out-of-the-box thinking to a new growth challenge?

If so, prepare yourself. We may well have the perfect role for you. 

Backed by leading venture capital funds and two media companies, Papercup is a machine learning startup making the world's content available in any language. Using a cutting-edge approach to speech processing, we're auto-translating the voice track on videos by generating voices that sounds just like the original speaker - but in different languages. 

As we march forward on our mission to remove the final layer of the language barrier, we’re looking for a marketing rockstar who has the creativity, ambition and acquisition expertise we need to supercharge our growth.  

You’ll be the driving force behind our customer acquisition.. 

- Coming up with creative acquisition strategies, targets and budgets across multiple digital channels
- Launching a myriad of campaigns from scratch and collaborating with the team to test audiences, propositions, landing pages (we have no rules, dream big and give it a go)
- Showing off your analytics prowess, constantly diagnosing and optimising the performance of strategies and campaigns 
- Championing consistent brand voice and message across all marketing channels

You’ll have growth and digital marketing experience of course, but you’ll also have… 

- A great love for content and inbound marketing (side romance with brand and social encouraged)
- The kind of data literacy and enthusiasm for analytics that your friends like to make fun of
- Frontline experience working with creators/influencers (an understanding of YouTube would be a definite bonus)
- A knack for community building 
- A magnificent depth of knowledge about major marketing channels and technologies 
- Battle scars from time spent working in a fast-growing start up environment 

We’re pretty confident you’ll love working for us.. 

- We're growing fast - this is a chance to help build this business and you will have a greater impact here than you would in years at most other companies
- We're early stage so you can build the processes you want without any red tape
- We really care about our people - culture matters deeply to us and we are committed to building a company that people are proud to work for

And we promise to take really good care of you…  

- Competitive salary and share options
- The excitement and freedom of an early stage VC-backed startup
- Unlimited holidays
- Industry-leading parental leave policy
- Pro bono days
- Comprehensive extended health care coverage
- A classic startup office space: think Shoreditch with a beanbag and in-house barista
- Food and fun: free snacks, Friday breakfasts, monthly team socials, annual offsites, Slack banter
